text: The best massage I had in a long time! The manual lymphatic drainage and meridian head combo is sooo good. Super relaxing and I feel refreshed and not puffed afterwards. Yuyu was my therapist. Sheâ€™s great, gentle but she knows the right spots to target. Will definitely come back!!

Been with Healing touch for many years. Went to many outlets before and most frequent one is Fort Canning. Belinda is the best!! Very attentive and always help me with my aches and pains. Hanisa is also a friendly and friendly front counter staff.

I have very good experiences in Healing Touch (Fort Canning). Nisa is such a nice lady in the shop. She is always very cheerful, helpful and caring. I feel very welcomed by her all the time. Belinda is a very professional masseur. Her skills are very good. She is also very considerate and will adjust her strength and approach to the need of her clients. I strongly recommend Healing Touch at Fort Canning. I will definitely visit them again.
Great massage by Masseuse Yoyo! & Receptionist Keiny was really helpful and kind :) I really appreciated the warm hospitality from both of them. Thank you!

Healing vibes. Good choice to select Yoyo as my massage therapist. Can feel her techniques and strength were evenly consistent. She was able to point out the tension that I was having. Overall, it was worth it. Feeling much relieved from my neck and shoulders.
